dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 4130 IH: Support Our Steelworkers Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Nolan introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To temporarily prohibit the importation of certain iron and steel articles.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Support Our Steelworkers Act of 2015.

section.header: Prohibition on importation of steel products
section.text: For the 5-year period beginning on the 15th day after the date of the enactment of this Act, an article classified under chapter 72 or 73 of the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States may not enter the customs territory of the United States.
